function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased reliance on digital solutions and smart technology for water infrastructure","Impact":"Dependence on technology may lead to system vulnerability and malfunction","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and testing of digital systems, redundancy in critical systems","Technologies":"Digital twins, AI techniques, smart meters and sensors","People":"Water infrastructure operators, technicians, and managers","Owner":"Water management organizations, technology providers"},{"Description":"Predictive maintenance and remote monitoring using digital twins","Impact":"Failure to accurately predict breakdowns or failures may lead to production losses and setbacks","Mitigation":"Redundant monitoring systems, regular calibration and maintenance of digital twins","Technologies":"Digital twins, AI techniques, predictive maintenance models","People":"Water infrastructure operators, technicians, and managers","Owner":"Water management organizations, technology providers"},{"Description":"Increased automation and real-time remote control of critical water infrastructure","Impact":"Dependence on automation may lead to risk of system failures and errors","Mitigation":"Implement fail-safe protocols, regular testing and quality assurance of automation systems","Technologies":"Digital twins, AI techniques, automation systems, remote control technology","People":"Water infrastructure operators, technicians, and managers","Owner":"Water management organizations, technology providers"}]}
